tool_description: Make a AWS Cloudwatch Dashboard Public
name: PublicCloudwatchDashboard
title: PublicCloudwatchDashboard

api_list.name: dashboard
api_list.description: Get private signed url to dashboard

required_parameters.name: updatefrequency
required_parameters.description: Update Frequency, combined with updatefrequencyunit, determines how often data in the dashboard is refreshed)

required_parameters.name: updatefrequencyunit
required_parameters.description: Time Unit for the updatefrequency parameter

required_parameters.name: region
required_parameters.description: The region in which the dashboard that you want to expose is defined in.

required_parameters.name: role
required_parameters.description: The IAM role to be assumed when reading Dashboard and Metrics

required_parameters.name: externalid
required_parameters.description: External ID used to Assume access to your IAM role

required_parameters.name: dashboard
required_parameters.description: The name of the Cloudwatch Dashboard

optional_parameters.name: infolinktext
optional_parameters.description: The text to be used for the info link on the dashboard

optional_parameters.name: infolink
optional_parameters.description: The link to be used when clicking the info text on the dashboard

optional_parameters.name: periodthree
optional_parameters.description: The third of the three time periods each metric on the dashboard is displayed for.

optional_parameters.name: forceupdate
optional_parameters.description: Update even if according to the updatefrequency, and update is not required

optional_parameters.name: periodone
optional_parameters.description: The first of the three time periods each metric on the dashboard is displayed for.

optional_parameters.name: periodtwo
optional_parameters.description: The second of the three time periods each metric on the dashboard is displayed for.

optional_parameters.name: companyname
optional_parameters.description: Provide the name of your company to be displayed on the dashboard

optional_parameters.name: companyurl
optional_parameters.description: The link to be used when clicking the company on the Dashboard
